definition[0]: a bad or unacceptable action that is not very serious
example[0]: Alfred beat his children for even the smallest misdemeanour.
definition[1]: a crime that is not very serious
definition[2]: a bad or unacceptable action that is not very serious, at least from a legal point of view
definition[3]: a crime that is not as serious as a FELONY (=very serious crime such as robbery or murder)
example[1]: He pleaded guilty to lying on a loan application, which is a misdemeanor in this state.
